CustomField.formula:
IF(isReportable_Text__c = 'Invalid', 0, IF(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c,'Annually'), ((New_Sales_Price__c* New_Quantity__c)/12)*Contract_Term__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c ,'Quarterly'),((New_Sales_Price__c* New_Quantity__c)/3)*Contract_Term__c, (New_Sales_Price__c* New_Quantity__c)*Contract_Term__c )))
/* Code prior to 2/24/2017 release that exempted existing services from this calculationIF(isReportable_Text__c = 'Invalid', 0, IF(Existing_Service__c = True, 0, IF(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c,'Annually'), ((New_Sales_Price__c* New_Quantity__c)/12)*Contract_Term__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c ,'Quarterly'),((New_Sales_Price__c* New_Quantity__c)/3)*Contract_Term__c, (New_Sales_Price__c* New_Quantity__c)*Contract_Term__c )))) */ /* Code prior to 7/10/2015 release that changed MRR and we needed to decouple MRR from this calculation IF( AND( isReportable_Text__c = 'Valid', Existing_Service__c = false ), MRR__c * Contract_Term__c, 0 ) */
CustomField.label: Total Product Revenue
